title: One Step Beyond
description:
A classic American TV series exploring the supernatural and paranormal.

Unlike other horror series of the time, One Step Beyond  purported to tell true stories of the fantastic. Most of the episodes could be described as being â€œinspiredâ€ rather than â€œbasedâ€ on actual events, and some events are so little documented as to be little more than â€œurban legend.â€ However, this should not detract from the viewerâ€™s enjoyment.

Created by Merwin Gerard and produced byÂ Collier Young,Â One Step BeyondÂ was hosted by John Newland, "your guide to theÂ supernatural" (also credited as "Our guide into the world of the unknown"). Newland presented tales that explored paranormal events and various situations that defied "logical" explanation. This ran for three seasons on ABC, January 1959 to July 1961.

A number of well-known names appear in the credits of these episodes, including Elizabeth Montgomery,Â Charles Bronson, Christopher Lee, Suzanne Pleshette, and William Shatner. 

This collection is from a 4-DVD set of the 50 best episodes
